item.title: 米莱解除货币管制后阿根廷人购买美元
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）在实行了五年的严格货币管制后，允许阿根廷储蓄者完全自由地购买美元。【原文：Argentine savers are going back to the bank to buy dollars after President Javier Milei granted them complete freedom to do so after five years of strict currency controls, at a time when many view the greenback as cheap.】

item.title: 德国将某些地点的天然气储存目标降至 45
item.description: 德国将把某些类型的天然气储存设施在 11 月 1 日前必须储存的天然气数量目标减半至 45%，其中包括位于雷登的德国最大的天然气储存设施。【原文：Germany will halve targets for how much gas has to be stockpiled by Nov. 1 to 45% for certain types of storage facilities — including the country’s largest in Rehden.】

item.title: 在特朗普的关税政策开始实施之前，大石油公司的利润就已受到冲击
item.description:
随着宏观环境的疲软，第一季度业绩不佳可能是来年的一个先兆。【原文：

With the macro environment weakening, flagging first-quarter results may be a harbinger of the year to come.

】

item.title: Prada 在奢侈品销售放缓的大背景下实现进一步增长
item.description: 普拉达公司（Prada SpA）公布的今年年初销售额好于预期，与整个奢侈品行业的疲软态势背道而驰，因为该意大利时尚集团旗下的 Miu Miu 品牌增长迅猛。【原文：Prada SpA reported better-than-expected sales for the start of the year, bucking the weakness across the wider luxury industry as growth soared at the Italian fashion group’s Miu Miu brand.】

item.title: 马塞洛-克劳尔扩展投资帝国，打造 Brightstar
item.description: 马塞洛-克劳尔（Marcelo Claure）是一位企业家和投资家，曾领导过软银集团公司（SoftBank Group Corp.【原文：Marcelo Claure, the entrepreneur and investor who previously steered SoftBank Group Corp.’s operations, is joining private equity firm Brightstar Capital Partners in a bid to extend its middle-market reach.】

item.title: 特朗普的新港口费对中国航运和世界贸易意味着什么？
item.description: 美国计划开始向停靠其港口的中国大型船只收取数百万美元的费用，这加深了世界两大经济体之间的贸易战。【原文：The US plans to start charging large Chinese ships millions of dollars to call at its ports, deepening the trade war between the world’s two largest economies.】

item.title: 特拉维斯-卡兰尼克的云厨探索中东部门的首次公开募股
item.description: 云厨（CloudKitchens）是优步（Uber Technologies Inc.据熟知内情的人士透露，优步公司前首席执行官特拉维斯-卡兰尼克（Travis Kalanick）经营的初创公司 CloudKitchens 正在探索对其中东业务进行首次公开募股。【原文：CloudKitchens, a startup run by former Uber Technologies Inc. Chief Executive Officer Travis Kalanick, is exploring an initial public offering of its Middle East operations, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: DoorDash 竞购 Deliveroo 标志着欧洲送餐热潮的结束
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，我们的每日时事通讯由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，孙亚洲将解读 DoorDash 收购 Deliveroo 的提议对这个从高位重挫的行业意味着什么。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Yazhou Sun unpacks what DoorDash’s offer to buy Deliveroo means for an industry that’s fallen hard from its pandemic highs.】

item.title: 普通手推车如何为特朗普的关税战提供借鉴
item.description: 一位历史学家在 YouTube 上解释说，独轮车最早的历史证据出现在大约 2000 年前的中国，又过了 12 个世纪，这种单轮推车才出现在欧洲。【原文：The earliest historical evidence of wheelbarrows appears in China about 2,000 years ago, a historian explains on YouTube, and it took another 12 centuries before these single-wheeled pushcarts appeared in Europe.】

item.title: 科技公司首席执行官与立法者共聚国家安全峰会
item.description: 硅谷在华盛顿日益增长的影响力将在本周三得到充分展示，届时科技巨头和风险投资家将与美国最高级别的立法者齐聚一堂，参加一场聚焦尖端技术如何促进国家安全和美国制造业的峰会。【原文：Silicon Valley’s growing influence in Washington will be on full display Wednesday as tech titans and venture capitalists gather with top US lawmakers for a summit focused on how cutting-edge technologies can bolster national security and American manufacturing.】

item.title: 危机领导者卡尼现在着手挽救加拿大经济增长
item.description: 我是兰迪-桑通-奈特（Randy Thanthong-Knight），驻渥太华的加拿大经济和政府问题记者。今天我们关注全国大选对经济政策的影响。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您尚未注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击此处。【原文：I’m Randy Thanthong-Knight, a reporter on Canada’s economy and government in Ottawa. Today we’re looking at the economic-policy implications of the national election. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 五月抛售 "威胁到 S&P 500 指数的反弹走势
item.description:
最著名的市场趋势之一是由数十年的历史业绩所支撑的。【原文：

One of the best-known market trends is backed by decades of historical performance. 

】

item.title: 机器需求下降，卡特彼勒盈利不及预期
item.description: 卡特彼勒公司（Caterpillar Inc.【原文：Caterpillar Inc. reported first-quarter profit that trailed analysts’ expectations amid falling demand for the company’s iconic yellow diggers and bulldozers.】

item.title: 超越战争经济，以色列向东拓展贸易
item.description: 以色列经济和工业部长尼尔-巴尔卡特（Nir Barkat）表示，以色列政府正寻求在未来 15 年内将出口额从 1,500 亿美元增加到近 1 万亿美元，因此以色列正转向阿拉伯半岛和印度市场以促进贸易。【原文：Israel is turning to markets in the Arabian Peninsula and India to boost trade as the government seeks to increase exports from $150 billion to almost $1 trillion over the next 15 years, according to Economy and Industry Minister Nir Barkat.】

item.title: 南非财政部长确定第三次预算尝试日期
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）将于 5 月 21 日重返议会，提交他今年第三次争取通过的预算案。【原文：South African Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana will return to parliament on May 21 to present his third attempt this year at getting a budget passed.】

item.title: 优步中东分部在迪拜送金币上门
item.description: 迪拜居民现在可以在一小时内将 24K 金币送到家中，因为超级应用程序 Careem 瞄准了阿拉伯联合酋长国的数百万印度人。【原文：Dubai residents can now have 24-carat gold coins delivered to their homes in less than an hour as super app Careem targets millions of Indians in the United Arab Emirates.】

item.title: 百胜中国利润低于预期，促销活动削弱利润率
item.description: 百胜中国控股有限公司（Yum China Holdings Inc.【原文：Yum China Holdings Inc. reported a weaker-than-expected operating profit last quarter, as promotions aimed at frugal diners pressured margins at the operator of KFC and Pizza Hut chains in China.】

item.title: 石油交易商为沙特主导的欧佩克+石油供应再次激增做好准备
item.description: 石油交易商预计，沙特阿拉伯将在下周引导欧佩克+就再次增加供应量达成一致，因为沙特将继续开展行动，惩戒该卡特尔中的违规成员。【原文：Oil traders expect Saudi Arabia to steer OPEC+ to agree on another supply surge next week as the kingdom continues its campaign to discipline the cartel’s errant members.】

item.title: 主席称西班牙电网运营商不应对停电负责
item.description: 据西班牙电网运营商主席称，该公司对本周早些时候影响该国的历史性大停电没有责任。【原文：Spain’s power grid operator is not responsible for the historic blackout that affected the country earlier in the week, according to the company’s chairwoman.】

item.title: 中国希望用厨余和昆虫替代饲料中的谷物
item.description: 中国已承诺利用厨余垃圾和昆虫蛋白生产更多饲料产品，同时减少谷物的使用，因为在与美国的全面贸易战中，中国政府正在加强粮食安全。【原文：China has pledged to churn out more feed products from kitchen waste and insect protein while cutting the use of grains, as Beijing shores up food security amid a full-blown trade war with the US.】

item.title: Meta 股价跑赢大盘，盈利仍需努力
item.description: 当 Meta Platforms 公司在周三下午公布财报时，这家社交媒体巨头将面临一个很高的障碍，那就是如何满足焦虑的投资者。【原文：When Meta Platforms Inc. reports earnings on Wednesday afternoon, the social media giant will face a high hurdle to satisfy anxious investors.】

item.title: 股市汹涌，"五月卖出 "的古老智慧重获关注
item.description: 一条古老的市场格言笼罩着美国股市的反弹：五月卖出，然后离开。【原文：An age-old market maxim looms over the bounce in US stocks: Sell in May and go away.】

item.title: 绿色电力将在周四满足德国 99% 的需求
item.description: 本周四，绿色电力将全面主导德国电网，有可能使电价远远低于零，这也是太阳能和风能如何改变欧洲最大市场的最新证明。【原文：Green electricity will totally dominate Germany’s grid on Thursday, potentially sending electricity prices way below zero and offer the latest proof on how solar and wind is transforming Europe’s biggest market.】

item.title: 法院就性别问题做出裁决后，英国统计局考虑修改调查内容
item.description: 最高法院的一项具有里程碑意义的裁决称，平等法对女性的定义是指她们出生时的性别，此后，英国统计机构正在考虑是否需要改变其收集数据的方式。【原文：The UK’s statistics agency is considering whether it needs to change the way it collects data after a landmark Supreme Court ruling said the definition of a woman under equalities law refers to their sex assigned at birth.】

item.title: 财政紧张加剧，哥伦比亚央行将保持利率稳定
item.description: 由于对国家公共开支的担忧使政策制定者不敢采取货币刺激措施，哥伦比亚中央银行可能将在连续第三次会议上保持利率稳定。【原文：Colombia’s central bank will likely hold its interest rate steady for a third straight meeting as concerns over the nation’s public spending deter policymakers from providing monetary stimulus.】

item.title: 国债在再融资计划和重要经济数据公布前保持稳定
item.description: 由于交易员们在等待通胀和经济增长数据，以及债务管理团队对 29 万亿美元市场的销售计划，美国国债保持了近期的涨势。【原文：US Treasuries held recent gains as traders awaited data on inflation and economic growth, as well as the debt management team’s plans for sales in the $29 trillion market.】

item.title: 初创电动飞机制造商 Heart 从瑞典迁往美国
item.description: 瑞典电动飞机制造商 Heart Aerospace AB 将把总部从哥德堡迁至洛杉矶，并称此举将促进产品开发。【原文：Swedish electric plane manufacturer Heart Aerospace AB is relocating its headquarters to Los Angeles from Gothenburg in a move it says will bolster product development.】

item.title: 贸易协议有望达成，资金流入，卢比升至今年最高点
item.description: 印度卢比飙升至今年以来的最高水平，原因是资金再次流入股市，以及人们对早日与美国达成贸易协议的预期。【原文：The Indian rupee surged to its highest level this year amid renewed inflows into stocks and expectations of an early trade deal with the United States.】

item.title: 特朗普在访问海湾地区前几周推出迪拜豪华大厦
item.description: 就在美国总统访问这个石油资源丰富的海湾地区前几周，特朗普组织开始销售迪拜的一座大厦和酒店，其中将包括豪华住宅。【原文：The Trump Organization is starting sales on a Dubai tower and hotel that’s set to include luxury homes, just weeks ahead of the US president’s visit to the oil-rich Gulf.】

item.title: 中国股票销售摆脱关税影响，超越美国和欧洲
item.description: 尽管贸易战的担忧减缓了美国和欧洲市场的销售，但中国企业仍摆脱了美国关税的影响，继续推进股票销售。【原文：Chinese companies have shrugged off US tariffs and powered on with share sales, even as trade-war concerns slowed offerings in the US and Europe.】
